w:r.w:t: For Company: Amended from 75 days to 45 days to reflect Vendor's standard payment terms.

For Didimo: This clause requires disclosure and written authorisation for any AI use. Your avatar generation uses machine learning (ML). Please add disclosure in Exhibit 1 describing your ML technology. Suggested wording added to Exhibit 1.
For Didimo: Please list any third party subcontractors who will have access to Company's data, including cloud service providers who host the data. These should be disclosed in Exhibit 1.
For Didimo: The Company owns all IP in the outputs (avatars) generated on their behalf. Please confirm whether this is acceptable, or whether you want to limit their use of outputs to the Term only.

For Didimo: This clause contains broad warranties including: (i) authority; (ii) non-infringement of IP (including for outputs); (iii) no viruses; (iv) no bias/discrimination in models; (v) compliance with law. The bias/discrimination warranty at (iv) is unusual and may not be covered by your insurance. Please confirm you are comfortable giving this warranty, or let me know if you would like to push back.

For Company: Vendor proposes to cap indemnity liability at USD $1,000,000, which aligns with Vendor's professional indemnity insurance coverage. This is proportionate for a trial engagement of this size. See proposed new Clause 11A below.

For Company: Vendor proposes to limit the application of Exhibit 3 to those sections which are relevant to Vendor's standalone SaaS service (Vendor does not integrate with Company's network or systems). The following sections would apply: Section 4 (Basic Security Requirements - specifically 4.1 Vulnerability Management and 4.4 Access Controls), Section 5 (Data Management and Isolation), Section 6 (Data Retention and Destruction), Section 8 (Cyber Security Incidents), and Section 9 (Application and Software Requirements). Sections 10 (Network Connectivity) and 11 (Contracted Personnel) do not apply as Vendor does not connect to Company's network.
For Didimo: Please confirm you are happy for the entire NBCUniversal group (all Affiliates) to benefit from this trial licence.

For Company: New clause proposed to cap Vendor's liability proportionately to the trial fees, with a supercap of $1m for the indemnity obligations. This reflects Vendor's insurance coverage and is proportionate for a trial engagement.
For Didimo: Please complete the bracketed sections with details of your training data sources and any third party AI/ML service providers. This disclosure is required to satisfy Clause 3.3 (AI Use).
For Didimo: Please list all subcontractors including cloud service providers (e.g. AWS, Azure, GCP) who will host or have access to Company data.
